description: This file defines a React component for a login page, handling user input for username and password, and performing a simulated login action that stores a token and navigates to a dashboard.

methods.name: Login
methods.description: React functional component rendering a login form, managing local state for username and password, performing login through a store, and navigating upon form submission.

methods.name: onSubmit
methods.description: Form submission handler that prevents default behavior, performs login with a fake token, and navigates to the dashboard.
